medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks prior to admission, with gradual worsening leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome and multiorgan failure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, hypertension, hypertriglyceridemia, and small cell lung cancer with liver metastasis.
medical_history.social_history: Injection drug user, lived in Indonesia.
